title: In case of building with mixed use, 50% of FSI utilized for residential purpose shall be considered for calculating requirement of tenements of a size equal to or less than 60 sq
clause_text: In case of building with mixed use, 50% of FSI utilized for residential purpose shall be considered for calculating requirement of tenements of a size equal to or less than 60 sq.m. carpet area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of building with mixed use, 50% of FSI utilized for residential purpose shall be considered for calculating requirement of tenements of a size equal to or less than 60 sq.m. carpet area.
